ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 618
ygData.msgSnippet: ... EQOA is going to be fun.  I got into the betas.  Beta2 is going to start soon.  Some people may call it EQ-lite but it s not really like that. It s just
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 5
> Date: Tue, 29 Oct 2002 19:08:52 -0000
> From: "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@...>
> Subject: EQ Online Adventures for the PS2
>
> So is anyone besides me going to get this? I'm really excited about
> it and look forward to it coming out. I was just wondering if anyone
> else on this list was going to get it.
>
>
>
> ____________________________________________

EQOA is going to be fun. I got into the betas. Beta2 is going to start
soon. Some people may call it 'EQ-lite' but it's not really like that.
It's just as fun as EQ.
Anybody planning to buy it, buy the network adapter as soon as you see
it. They are sometimes hard to find. Also, buy a USB keyboard or a
regular keyboard with a USB adapter, keyboards make it much easier to
communicate.
Can't really tell any details of the game because of the EULA they make
us agree to.
Somebody who was in the Disney beta said that was actually much better
than you'd think a 'kid-themed MMOG' would be. Don't think I'd buy it
tho. Don't see it making it very long. May do well at first, but after
a while the kids will lose interest or grow out of it.
--

Bebinn Maolcataig 39 Woodelf Druid, Disciple of Tunare, Dignatio cum
Demori, Bertoxx server

Lindira 23 Vah Shir Bard,Jharin Apprentice, Bertoxx
